name: Cybernetic Eye, Rangefinder (TL-13)
description:
The rangefinder projects a low-energy infrared laser beam and determines range from the reflection. The rangefinder eye is accurate within 1% of range out to 5 kilometers. Smoke, blown sand, and any sort of atmospheric conditions will interfere with eyes. They have a short range of 100 meters. This version of the cybernetic eye looks more like a natural, unaltered eye.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.

NOTE: The rangefinder cybernetic eye requires the eyeball display to be installed.
